text: You know where [[Twitter]] asks "What's happening?" This might work better. It's in the spirit of the Progressive commercials where they teach people not to be their parents. "The waiter does not need to know your name." Yet there are exceptions. There are a few people who write on Facebook who, when they write, I always stop and read. Because they have a track record of finding interesting things for me to think about. They write well too.
